page.title: 05Religion in Newborough.
page.content: From the results of the Domesday survey,it would appear that the majority of church goers interviewed were married or confirmed before they moved into the area.So it follows that a large number of people are not native to the area. A lot of the people in the area either go to Eye village church or to the local Newborough church.37% of them walk,no one cycles,23% travel there by car and one percent go by bus. Out of the sample interviewed 10% go to church weekly, 9% go monthly and 45% go occasionally usually for festivals or special occasions.36% don't go to church.The main reason for not going was,"I have not got enough time".
